name: rchain-toolkit
description: Node JS utils and methods to interact with rchain's rnode api and proto interfaces

scripts.compile: tsc src/index.ts --outDir dist -d && cp -r src/protobuf dist/ && cp src/rnode-protos* dist/
scripts.compile:tests: tsc tests/index.ts --outDir testsc && cp -r src/protobuf testsc/src/ && cp src/rnode-protos.js testsc/src/

author: FABCO
